entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
